about.title: About us
about.text1: We believe that every candle has its own story and we are happy to share this magic with you. Our candles are more than just objects. They are created with love and meticulous attention to detail to ignite your hearts and bring comfort to your special moments.
about.text2: VALWAX is yours, special. Welcome to our world of magical burning. Feel the touch of art and the unique aura of our candles.
about.text3: Let us create a fiery atmosphere for you, where every moment becomes special and exceptional. Touch the magic of light with our unique candles. Release your inner creativity and create your own special world where every candle is a small miracle.

waxDesc.title: Why soy?
waxDesc.text: Soy wax is safe. It is not toxic and does not evaporate harmful substances. The low melting point allows you to use candles as long as possible. It is a vegetable wax that is produced from soybeans - a natural and restorative product. Soy wax has a good performance in the solid and molten state of both essential oils and specially formulated synthetic oils.

waxDesc.title: Why palm?
waxDesc.text: Palm wax is obtained from the fruits of palm trees that grow in tropical regions. Palm wax has a high melting point, which allows candles to burn longer. You will enjoy the warm and cozy atmosphere created by candles with palm wax for a long time. And the frosty patterns of palm wax will enchant you.

waxDesc.title: Why coconut?
waxDesc.text: Coconut wax is a natural product. By choosing coconut wax for your candles, you help preserve the environment and support nature. This wax has a natural and pleasant coconut aroma, which adds a special charm to your candles. It creates a warm and cozy atmosphere in any room. Most often used for massage candles.

welcome.title: Welcome to your personal candle-making studio!
text: Here, you become an artist of light, and we believe that each candle you create will be unique and expressive, just like you. A candle is more than just a flame. It's the ambiance you craft. It's relaxation and tranquility after a long day. It's a gift for loved ones. It's warmth and comfort.
instruction: Welcome to the Candle Maker's Studio!

Would you like to create a unique candle that matches your taste and mood? You're in the right place! Our candle builder allows you to choose all the necessary components to create the perfect candle just for you. Here are the steps you need to follow:
1. Choose a container shape. We have a wide range of containers, from classic cylindrical to unusual shapes, so you can express your individuality.
2. Select the type of wax: we offer three types of wax for your candles: soy, coconut, and palm. Each of them has its unique advantages, and you can choose the one you prefer.
3. Choose the scent: pick the fragrance you want to experience when your candle is burning. We have a wide variety of scents, from fresh citrus to warm vanilla notes.
4. Add a wick: to make your candle have a wick, select it. A wick will add a special charm to your candle and make the burning more even.
5. Pick the color: choose the color of the wax and container that you like the most. Your candle can be bright and vibrant or neutral and cozy (without color) - it's your choice.
6. Customization and completion: after completing these steps, we will create a unique candle for you that will meet all your wishes.
Don't wait, start creating your candle right now and enjoy the atmosphere it will create in your space. Thank you for choosing us for your creative ideas and special moments!

sections.subTitle: Internet Store Security Policy
texts: The administration of the internet store guarantees that the personal data provided to the website will be used properly.
The personal data and contact information of the website user/customer (the 'User') will not be disclosed to third parties, except as required by law or with the User's consent (as indicated below).

The administration of the internet store agrees not to send unwanted or unsolicited emails (spam) to Users, except for important business or communication emails to which the User has given consent. This includes greetings and information about ongoing discounts.
Registered Users can quickly and easily unsubscribe from receiving emails by simply clicking the 'Unsubscribe' link at the end of one of the emails.

sections.subTitle: Confidentiality
texts: The administration of the internet store respects the personal information of all Users of our store. All activities of the internet store on the Internet are carried out in accordance with current European legislation and Ukrainian legislation. The rules for protecting personal data ('Security Policy') regulate the disclosure of information obtained by the internet store about Users (as mentioned above) who visit it. The administration of the internet store uses collected user personal data in accordance with Law No. 2297-VI 'On the Protection of Personal Data.'

sections.subTitle: Collection and Processing of Personal Data
texts: All Users can visit the internet store without disclosing any personal data. However, failure to provide the necessary information requested in the relevant information input sections and other sections of the website may result in the inability of the internet store to provide certain services and products to Users. If a User makes a purchase through the website or by phone, the User enters into contractual relations with the administration of the internet store. The User is asked to provide the necessary personal data during the transaction.

For the purpose of fulfilling user requests and other purposes as specified below, the internet store may request the following data from the User: name, surname, date of birth, gender, email and postal addresses, phone number, mobile phone number, age, and other data. The internet store also records data about the User's successful purchases. By voluntarily subscribing to the website or ordering products from the internet store, the User agrees (gives consent) to the inclusion of their personal data in the information system, both manually and automatically, in full and for the purposes specified below, in accordance with the law on the protection of personal data. If the User does not agree to this, they have the right not to use the website and not to provide their personal data to the administration of the internet store.

The administration of the internet store has the right to use disclosed data for the period required to achieve the relevant purpose of processing personal data and mandatory archiving, in accordance with applicable legislation, without harming the obligations of the internet store arising from special regulation. Giving consent to the processing of personal data is voluntary, and the User has the right to withdraw such consent by sending an email to the internet store's email address.

User rights regarding the processing of their personal data are established in the Personal Data Protection Act and include, among other things, the right to update or delete personal data from the internet store's information system. The User also has the right to receive a copy of personal data processed by the internet store and the right to appeal to the Data Protection Authority of Ukraine in case of suspicion of unauthorized use of personal data.

sections.subTitle: Other Ways of Obtaining Information
texts: In addition to obtaining data through the website, the User may be offered to provide their personal data through written correspondence with the administration of the internet store, in a phone conversation with the administration of the internet store, when placing an order, submitting a service request, during the registration of purchased goods for warranty and post-warranty service, registration for participation in interactive surveys, or any business offers, in the process of exchanging real-time text messages, and so on. In such cases, the User will be separately asked to consent to the processing of their personal data by the administration of the internet store if such consent is required by law.

sections.subTitle: Purpose of Personal Data Collection and Processing
texts: The administration of the internet store processes personal data for the following purposes:

Performing specific actions to fulfill purchase and sale transactions or other agreements between the administration of the internet store and the User, including payment monitoring and delivery of the User's order;

Providing relevant service support, including services related to the activities of the internet store, such as warranty and post-warranty service, gathering user opinions on the services and products of the internet store, offering Users special deals and promotional campaigns, conducting product surveys, handling user requests for information about the internet store, its products and services, informing the User about internet store updates, improving the store's products and services, and conducting lotteries, contests, and other promotional activities.

sections.subTitle: Use and Disclosure of Information to Third Parties
texts: The administration of the internet store uses the obtained information solely for personal purposes as mentioned above. Employees of the internet store are obligated to respect the confidentiality of information provided by Users in accordance with applicable laws. Personal data may be disclosed to third parties in cases where the administration of the internet store reasonably deems it necessary. This may also occur for the purpose of preventing fraud, fulfilling obligations, protecting the rights of the internet store, or in cases of corporate changes, such as mergers, acquisitions, sales, or purchases of company assets, and so on.

sections.subTitle: Automatically Recorded Information (Non-Personal Data)
texts: Upon entering the site (as a registered user), some non-personal information (browser type, number of visits, average visit duration, visited pages) is automatically recorded. This information is used to appropriately respond with the aim of improving the website's content and functionality. This information may be used by the administration of the internet store in the future or shared with third parties, except in cases where the User requests to cease such usage by contacting the store's email address.

sections.subTitle: Security+
texts: The administration of the internet store intends to protect and manage the personal data of all users of its websites in accordance with Ukrainian law and the Personal Data Protection Act. The administration of the internet store has taken all necessary technical, organizational, and personal measures in accordance with Ukrainian laws, including the Personal Data Protection Act, to ensure the security and protection of user personal data from accidental unlawful destruction or loss, improper handling, unauthorized disclosure or access, as well as from other unlawful forms of use.

sections.subTitle: Minors
texts: The administration of the internet store strongly recommends that all parents and guardians teach their children to safely and responsibly handle personal data on the internet. Individuals under 18 years of age should not disclose their personal data on the website without the consent of their parents or guardians. The administration of the internet store will never intentionally request personal data from individuals under 18 years of age or use them in any way, and the administration of the internet store confirms that Users of its website are 18 years of age and older.

sections.subTitle: Links to Other Websites
texts: This Privacy Policy applies to the main page. Some pages on these websites may contain links to other organizations within or outside the internet store's structure. When Users leave the website, they are advised to follow the link and read the privacy policies for each website that collects personal data.

The administration of the internet store does not control the information contained on these websites, as well as the privacy policies applicable to these websites, and is not responsible for any content, goods, or services they offer. Using such websites linked to is subject to the terms and agreements applicable to such websites.
The right to receive information, newsletters, advertising messages, and their cancellation

The administration of the internet store welcomes requests from Users for information about the internet store's privacy policy, which can be sent to the store's email address. Users who do not wish to receive advertising messages (or newsletters) can unsubscribe by sending a corresponding request to this email address.

sections.subTitle: Notice of Changes
texts: Users will be informed of any changes and additions made to this Privacy Policy. By using the website or ordering goods on the website following the notice of changes to the Security Policy, the User agrees to the changes contained in the updated version in full.
